Title: Battle hymn of the Xisha (Paracel) Islands
Designer: Huang Shude (黄树德)Deng Guoyuan (邓国源)Yu Qiwan (余其万)Bi Yihan (薜翊汉)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: On 19 January 1974, the Battle of the Paracel Islands took place, a military engagement between the naval forces of China and South Vietnam. The battle was an attempt by the South Vietnamese navy to expel the Chinese navy from the vicinity.
Theme: Foreign Friends: IndochinaPeople's Liberation Army Navy
